voidfindertk.core.cleaners module

Module for performing void cleaning.

voidfindertk.core.cleaners.get_cleaner(*, cleaner_method)

Returns the appropriate cleaner function based on the specified method.

Parameters

cleaner_methodstr

The cleaning method to use. Must be one of: - “overlap”: Uses _overlap_cleaner. - “cbl”: Uses _cbl_cleaner.

Returns

function

The corresponding cleaner function.

Raises

ValueError

If an invalid cleaner_method is provided.
